title: Cryptic Crossword 10
description:
This crossword was an excuse to try out some split clues.
All the split answers have a theme, which is shared with the two longer answers as well.

clues.clue: Officer with American sailors going round California assemble first on part of deck

Infantryman to get a look at magazine

Little creature from Eastern country catches cold
Engineers agree rounding measurement incompletely created poorly defined region

Talked with current head of department on bringing back short course
Rubbish unfinished sample of song
Many were killed, leading to holy communion being cut short at the beginning
Rock ball
Take care of a clergyman
Scientist, from old city that is to the east of America, ignores answer on evolution
Resistance to expressing disapproval in text? Send back nothing first
Many years are brought up
Engineers return with unknown rock
Deals cards out, having picked up incomplete trick
Short journey please, without a car at the front for a drink
Shapes of letters, including essential symbol, and digits, first ten ascending
Two different graduates after article on the French state

A most abnormal hole
